keyFacts: Document is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for Friday, August 2, 2019.
It details shift schedules, post assignments, leave statuses (sick, annual), and overtime/comptime occurrences for correctional staff.
The roster shows standard prison operations with posts like SHU (Special Housing Unit), WITSEC (Witness Security), ATTY CONF (Attorney Conference), and LOBBY.
The document is an administrative record, not directly related to any specific incident or inmate, but shows the facility's operational staffing.
